ovdesc.p: This ‘H’ type table contains the locking switches related to the 3 UNIFI.XML… tables and to the 2 previous ones. They can lock temporally the cross update of the tables during their loading through DL.DEFINE and forbid any update attempt except the description in the same tables.

desc.p: This Field contains the Value ‘Y’ which Prevent any record update in the 5 tables except the description field.
Value upto 1 and User can input only value 'Y'
This Field contains the Value ‘Y’ which Lock any cross update while authorizing a record in the 5 basic definition tables.

This switch has to be set to ‘Y’ before loading the tables otherwise, not only the order of records matters, but also the CHECKFILE are applying to not yet authorize reffered records. Do not forget to remove the switch before any modify attempt. The 2nd switch prevents any update and is worth to be kept at ‘Y’ by the administrator as long as no update is to be made.
Value upto 1 and User can input only value 'Y'
This Specify the ID of the Application and the Unique ID is ‘SYSTEM’
